Please send comments about CSU, Chico to the University Communications.To report an error or broken link on a website, or request a change, use the Change Request Form.Campus Office HoursAcademic Year8 a.m.–5 p.m. (PST), Monday–FridaySummer Hours7 a.m.–5:30 p.m. (PST), Monday–Thursday, Closed FridaysMailing InformationDepartment Name (if known)California State University, Chico 400 W. First Street Chico, CA  95929Shipping/Delivery InformationDepartment Name (if known)California State University, Chico 940 W. First Street Chico, CA  95929-1001We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, the Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus.We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.MenuChico State HomeAboutAcademicsAdmissionsCost & AidStudent LifeAcademic DepartmentsAthleticsAlumniParentsChico FactsGiveResourcesQuicklinksCampus CalendarCampus SafetyJob OpportunitiesAccessibility Resource CenterAnnual Security Report (PDF)
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
